sorters

Class PermutationSorter<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorters.AbstractArraySorter<T>
      • sorters.PermutationSorter<T>

  • public class PermutationSorter<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
extends AbstractArraySorter<T>
    This class models a InsertionSorter object that will be able to sort arrays according to the permutation sort algorithm.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class sorters.AbstractArraySorter

        Creates a new instance of sorter that will be able to sort arrays according to the permutation sort algorithm.
        Parameters:
        array - the array to sort.
        name - the name you want to give to the sorter. Used in MultipleStateArrayTracer
